items.title: Germany votes for historic boost to defence spending
items.description: The move alters the German constitution, allowing the country to increase its military spending.

items.title: 'Once again, fear has gripped the people'
items.description: Gaza residents were woken by airstrikes hitting buildings as Israel shattered a two-month ceasefire.

items.title: Why has Israel bombed Gaza and what next for ceasefire deal?
items.description: The truce was already in trouble - now Israeli air strikes have dealt it a huge blow.

items.title: Tanker owners praise 'exceptionally brave crew'
items.description: Oil tanker Stena Immaculate and cargo ship Solong collided in the North Sea on 10 March.

items.title: What to expect from Trump's phone call with Putin on Ukraine
items.description: The US president says elements of a Ukraine ceasefire have been agreed, but "much remains" to be worked on.
